item.title: 丰田第一季度美国汽车销量增长近 1
item.description: 丰田汽车公司北美分公司周二公布，受皮卡和豪华车型需求的推动，第一季度美国汽车销量增长了约 1%。【原文：Toyota Motors' North American unit reported a rise of about 1% in first-quarter U.S. vehicle sales on Tuesday, fueled by demand for its pickup trucks and luxury models.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：梅赛德斯考虑因特朗普关税问题撤下美国入门级汽车
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周二援引消息人士的话报道称，梅赛德斯-奔驰集团（Mercedes-Benz Group）正在考虑从美国撤出价格最低的汽车，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的汽车关税可能会损害这些汽车的销售。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Group is considering withdrawing its least expensive cars from the U.S. as President Donald Trump's auto tariffs would potentially harm their sales, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing sources.】

item.title: 汽车制造商与英国反垄断监管机构就竞争法案件达成和解
item.description: 英国竞争与市场管理局（Competition and Markets Authority）周二表示，包括宝马和福特在内的十家汽车制造商以及两个行业机构已与英国竞争监管机构达成和解，承认在汽车回收方面违反了竞争法，将支付 7770 万英镑（约合 1.0043 亿美元）的罚款。【原文：Ten car manufacturers, including BMW and Ford , and two trade bodies have reached a settlement with the UK's competition regulator to pay 77.7 million pounds ($100.43 million) in a fine after admitting to breaking competition law in relation to vehicle recycling, Competition and Markets Authority said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 对冲基金如何为特朗普的 "解放日 "布局
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）的数据显示，在本周美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布对等关税之前，对冲基金已经缩减了风险押注，转而寻求安全。【原文：Hedge funds have scaled back risky bets and sought safety, data from Goldman Sachs shows, ahead of this week's widely anticipated announcement by U.S. President Donald Trump on reciprocal tariffs that has fuelled trade war fears.】

item.title: 大陆集团：第一季度北美轻型汽车产量可能下降 7
item.description: 德国汽车供应商大陆集团（Continental AG）周二表示，预计第一季度北美地区的轻型汽车产量将下降约 7%，原因是在即将对该行业征收关税之前存在 "经济不确定性"。【原文：Continental AG expects production of light vehicles in North America to fall by around 7% in the first quarter, the German auto supplier said on Tuesday, citing "economic uncertainty" ahead of looming tariffs on the sector.】

item.title: 普拉克明工厂扩建，3 月份美国液化天然气出口激增
item.description: 根据美国液化天然气公司（LSEG）的初步数据，美国 3 月份的液化天然气（LNG）出口量创下历史新高，销售了超过 900 万公吨的超冷天然气。【原文：The U.S. exported a record amount of liquefied natural gas (LNG) in March, selling more than 9 million metric tons (MT) of the superchilled gas, according to preliminary data from LSEG.】

item.title: 通用汽车第一季度美国汽车销量增长近 17
item.description: 通用汽车公司周二公布，受皮卡和经济型跨界 SUV 需求的推动，第一季度美国汽车销量增长了约 17%。【原文：General Motors reported an about 17% rise in first-quarter U.S. sales on Tuesday, helped by demand for its pickup trucks and affordable crossover SUVs.】

item.title: 瑞典将购买四架巴西航空工业公司货机
item.description: 瑞典政府周二表示，计划与荷兰和奥地利达成协议，从巴西航空工业公司购买四架 C-390 运输机，用于瑞典军队。【原文：Sweden's government said on Tuesday it plans to buy four C-390 transport planes from Embraer for its military, via an agreement with the Netherlands and Austria.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空客 3 月份交付了约 70 架喷气式飞机，同比增长 11
item.description: 业内消息人士周二称，空中客车公司 3 月份交付了约 70 架飞机，比前一个月的 40 架大幅增加，比去年 3 月份增加了约 11%。【原文：Airbus delivered about 70 planes in March, industry sources said on Tuesday, up sharply from 40 in the previous month and up about 11% from March last year.】

item.title: 意大利咖啡制造商伊利警告关税将推高美国咖啡价格
item.description: 意大利高端咖啡制造商 Illycaffe 公司首席执行官克里斯蒂娜-斯科奇亚（Cristina Scocchia）周二表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府本周将对该公司征收任何关税，该公司将被迫提高价格。【原文：Italian premium coffee maker Illycaffe' will be forced to raise prices in response to any tariffs imposed this week by U.S. President Donald Trump's administration, its CEO Cristina Scocchia said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音公司近年来犯下 "严重错误" -- 首席执行官证词
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥伯格（Kelly Orberg）将于周三告诉立法者，在2024年1月一架新型737 MAX飞机在空中发生紧急情况后，这家美国飞机制造商犯下了 "严重错误"。【原文：Boeing CEO Kelly Orberg will tell lawmakers on Wednesday the U.S. planemaker has made "serious missteps" after a January 2024 mid-air emergency involving a new 737 MAX.】

item.title: 南非寻求与美国就汽车关税问题举行会谈
item.description: 南非贸易部长帕克斯-陶（Parks Tau）周二表示，南非将寻求与美国当局就汽车关税问题举行会谈。【原文：South Africa will seek a meeting with U.S. authorities on auto tariffs, Trade Minister Parks Tau said on Tuesday, noting the levies are a concern as the country has preferential trade status with the United States.】

item.title: 欧盟就汽车回收卡特尔向汽车制造商开出 4.58 亿欧元罚单
item.description: 欧盟委员会周二向 15 家主要汽车制造商和欧洲汽车制造商协会开出了约 4.58 亿欧元（4.9464 亿美元）的罚单，原因是它们参与了有关报废汽车回收的卡特尔。【原文：The European Commission issued on Tuesday a fine amounting to about 458 million euros ($494.64 million) to 15 major car manufacturers and the European Automobiles Manufacturers' Association for participating in a cartel regarding end-of-life vehicle recycling.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，阿里巴巴准备最快于 4 月发布人工智能旗舰机型
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引一位熟悉内情的人士的话报道，中国阿里巴巴集团正计划最快于本月发布其人工智能旗舰机型 "奇闻三号 "的升级版。【原文：China's Alibaba Group is planning to release Qwen 3, an upgraded version of its flagship AI model, as soon as this month, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份建筑支出超出预期
item.description: 由于抵押贷款利率下降推动了单户住宅建设，美国 2 月份的建筑支出增幅超过预期，但进口关税导致的经济不确定性上升可能会减缓建筑支出的增长势头。【原文：U.S. construction spending increased more than expected in February as a decline in mortgage rates boosted single-family homebuilding, though rising economic uncertainty because of tariffs on imports could slow momentum.】

item.title: 经济不确定性上升，美国2月职位空缺减少
item.description: 由于进口关税导致经济不确定性上升，抑制了对劳动力的需求，美国 2 月份的职位空缺有所下降。【原文：U.S. job openings fell in February as rising uncertainty over the economy due to tariffs on imports curbed demand for labor.】

item.title: 在美国宣布关税之前，巴西仍对关税谈判持开放态度
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周二表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布期待已久的互惠进口关税之前，巴西将保持与美国谈判的开放态度。【原文：Brazil Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Tuesday that his country would maintain its openness to negotiate with the United States ahead of a long-awaited announcement by President Donald Trump on reciprocal import tariffs.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧佩克+成员国将于周四举行会议，并可能坚持增产计划
item.description: 欧佩克+"生产国集团的消息人士告诉路透社，欧佩克+部长们将于周四举行会议，很可能批准从五月起进一步增加石油产量。【原文：OPEC+ ministers will meet on Thursday and are likely to approve a further increase in oil production from May, sources from the producer group told Reuters.】

item.title: 根据电子邮件，美国农业部为辞职员工提供经济奖励
item.description: 据路透社共享的一份周一晚间发给员工的电子邮件显示，美国农业部正在为本月离职的员工提供经济奖励。【原文：The U.S. Department of Agriculture is offering employees financial incentives to leave the agency this month, according to a Monday evening email sent to staff and shared with Reuters.】

item.title: 激进分子在第一季度加强了对全球公司的要求，重点关注美国公司
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）的最新数据显示，第一季度，企业煽动者在全球范围内针对更多企业施加压力，要求它们提高业绩，而大多数变革要求都是针对美国企业的。【原文：Corporate agitators increased pressure on companies globally to perform better by targeting more of them worldwide during the first quarter, with most demands for change directed at U.S. corporations, according to new data from Barclays.】

item.title: 关税焦虑加剧，美国制造业重陷萎缩
item.description: 美国制造业在连续两个月增长后，3 月份出现萎缩，而衡量工厂通胀的指标则跃升至近三年来的最高水平，原因是对进口商品关税的忧虑不断升温。【原文：U.S. manufacturing contracted in March after growing for two straight months, while a measure of inflation at the factory gate jumped to the highest level in nearly three years amid rising anxiety over tariffs on imported goods.】

item.title: 美国特殊性减弱，美国债券管理公司 PIMCO 将目光投向海外
item.description: 美国债券公司PIMCO周二表示，在唐纳德-特朗普总统的政策下，商业和消费者信心的减弱正在削弱美国资本市场相对于世界其他地区的优势，从而加强了投资者在全球范围内进行多元化投资的理由。【原文：U.S. bond firm PIMCO said on Tuesday that waning business and consumer confidence under President Donald Trump's policies is eroding the edge U.S. capital markets held over the rest of the world, strengthening the case for investors to diversify globally.】

item.title: 吉卜力效应推出病毒式功能后，聊天 GPT 的使用率创下新高
item.description: 上周，使用 ChatGPT 图像生成工具创作吉卜力风格人工智能艺术的热潮导致 OpenAI 聊天机器人的用户数量创下历史新高，服务器不堪重负，暂时限制了该功能的使用。【原文：The frenzy to create Ghibli-style AI art using ChatGPT's image-generation tool led to a record surge in users for OpenAI's chatbot last week, straining its servers and temporarily limiting the feature's usage.】

item.title: 美国对越南征收关税将对耐克和其他运动品牌造成打击
item.description: 耐克公司在重振品牌和扭转长期销售下滑的努力中，可能很快会面临又一次打击：美国对从越南进口的商品征收关税。【原文：Nike could soon face another blow in its effort to revive its brand and reverse a long decline in sales: U.S. tariffs on imports from Vietnam.】

item.title: 投资者向欧洲 ETF 投资创纪录的 110 亿美元，以 "让欧洲再次伟大"。
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）的数据显示，第一季度美国投资者向专注于欧洲股票的交易所交易基金投入了创纪录的 106 亿美元，是去年同期流入量的七倍。【原文：U.S. investors poured a record $10.6 billion into exchange-traded funds focused on European stocks in the first quarter, seven times the inflows recorded a year earlier, according to data from BlackRock .】

item.title: 福特第一季度美国汽车销量下降 1.3
item.description: 福特汽车公司周二公布，受部分车型停产和某些租赁车队销售时机的影响，第一季度美国汽车销量下降了 1.3%。【原文：Ford Motor reported a 1.3% drop in first-quarter U.S. sales on Tuesday, hit by the discontinuation of some models and the timing of certain rental fleet sales.】

item.title: Michael Kors 所有者卡普里首席财务官爱德华兹加盟梅西百货担任财务主管
item.description: 卡普里控股公司的财务总监托马斯-爱德华兹（Thomas Edwards）将离开公司，加盟连锁百货公司梅西百货公司（Macy's）担任首席财务官。【原文：Capri Holdings's finance chief Thomas Edwards will leave the company to join department store chain Macy's as its chief financial officer.】

item.title: Cerebras Systems 和 Ranovus 赢得美国军方 4500 万美元的交易，用于加速芯片连接
item.description: 总部位于硅谷的人工智能芯片公司 Cerebras Systems 和加拿大芯片初创公司 Ranovus 周二表示，它们已获得美国军方价值 4500 万美元的合同，以加速计算芯片之间的连接。【原文：Cerebras Systems, a Silicon Valley-based AI chip company, and Canadian chip startup Ranovus said on Tuesday that they had been awarded a $45 million contract from the U.S. military to speed up connections between computing chips.】

item.title: 高通公司考虑收购英国 Alphawave 公司
item.description: 芯片制造商高通公司（Qualcomm）周二表示，正在考虑收购英国 Alphawave IP Group 公司。【原文：Chipmaker Qualcomm said on Tuesday it is considering making an offer to acquire UK-based Alphawave IP Group .】

item.title: 沃尔什表示，即将到来的贸易关税尚未打击航班需求
item.description: 全球航空机构国际航空运输协会（IATA）的负责人表示，美国威胁征收贸易关税不太可能阻止COVID之后旅游需求的激增，唐纳德-特朗普总统的做法最终可能会对航空业产生积极影响。【原文：The head of global airlines body IATA said threatened U.S. trade tariffs were unlikely to halt a post-COVID surge in travel demand, and that President Donald Trump's approach could ultimately be positive for the industry.】
